meanings.definition: A printing press in which ink is transferred to paper by pressing it onto a raised surface.
meanings.sent1: The old letterpresses at the museum are fascinating to see.
meanings.sent2: The printing company invested in new letterpresses for their business.
meanings.sent3: The letterpresses chatted quietly among themselves about the latest news in the printing world.
meanings.sent4: The letterpresses hummed with activity, bringing words to life on the paper.
meanings.sent5: The smell of ink and paper filled the room as the letterpresses worked tirelessly.
